DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo control , four-arm , dose-ranging study . The purpose evaluate relationship dose lebrikizumab response term efficacy , safety , tolerability patient asthma inhaled steroid .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Lebrikizumab ( MILR1444A ) Adult Patients With Asthma Who Are Not Taking Inhaled Corticosteroids
